overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers across these platforms. His posts cover a range of topics related to social media research, with a particular focus on disinformation and computational methods. Engagement varies by platform, with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction levels.

contentThemes.description: Posts related to studying and understanding disinformation across social media platforms.
Updates about new research papers, grants, and projects.
Posts about hiring and opportunities for research positions.

recommendations: Increase frequency of posts on Bluesky, which shows high engagement rates.
Engage more with followers through comments and discussions, especially on LinkedIn where comments are significant.

platformInsights.twitter: Twitter data is not available in the current dataset.
platformInsights.mastodon: Posts on methodological discussions and tool releases generate moderate engagement.
platformInsights.linkedin: Posts related to research grants and hiring receive the highest engagement in terms of likes and comments.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
